messages.content:
Analyze the following stakeholder's opinions and sentiment towards Fortescue. The stakeholder is Bart Kolodziejczyk, who has been identified as: Former Chief Scientist at Fortescue.

Context and Quotes:
Quote: "You actually had to step out of Fortescue to brainstorm, ideate and develop a pathway."
Context: In their role as Former Fortescue chief scientist, they stated: "You actually had to step out of Fortescue to brainstorm, ideate and develop a pathway."
Quote: "Two of the original architects of Fortescue Future Industries - former chief financial officer Michael Masterman and former chief scientist Bart Kolodziejczyk revealed last week they had launched their own green iron start-up."
Context: In their role as Former chief scientist at Fortescue Future Industries, they stated: "Two of the original architects of Fortescue Future Industries - former chief financial officer Michael Masterman and former chief scientist Bart Kolodziejczyk revealed last week they had launched their own green iron start-up."
Quote: "There is so much interest in what we do both in Australia and globally, in particular in the US, that we believe that we can make it."
Context: In their role as Co-founder and Chief Technology Officer of Element Zero, they stated: "There is so much interest in what we do both in Australia and globally, in particular in the US, that we believe that we can make it."
Quote: "As the matter is now before the court, we will not be making further comment at this time."
Context: In their role as Former Chief Scientist at Fortescue, they stated: "As the matter is now before the court, we will not be making further comment at this time."

Provide a 4 sentence analysis that covers:
1. The stakeholder's overall position towards Fortescue
2. The consistency or evolution of their views
3. The potential impact of their opinions on Fortescue's reputation or operations
4. Any notable patterns in their sentiment (Negative, Negative, Positive, Neutral)

Important: Your response must be exactly 4 sentences - no more, no less.
Format your response as a single paragraph without any headers or bullet points.

Bart Kolodziejczyk's overall position towards Fortescue appears to be mixed, with indications of past frustrations regarding innovation constraints but no overt hostility. His views seem to have evolved from being a key contributor at Fortescue Future Industries to pursuing independent ventures, suggesting a shift towards greater autonomy in green technology development. His departure and subsequent launch of a competing green iron start-up could impact Fortescue’s reputation by signaling potential internal challenges in fostering innovation. The sentiment in his statements follows a pattern of negative (expressing limitations at Fortescue), negative (departing to start a competitor), positive (optimism about his new venture), and neutral (declining to comment on legal matters).
